benchmark_details.name: AutoDCWorkflow: LLM-based Data Cleaning Workflow Auto-Generation and Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: AutoDCWorkflow evaluates LLM agents' ability to automate data cleaning workflows by generating a benchmark dataset consisting of annotated purposes, answers, raw tables, manually curated clean tables, and workflows.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Evaluate the effectiveness of LLMs in generating automated data cleaning workflows.

data.source: Six real-world datasets sampled for data analysis purposes.
data.annotation: Manually curated tables and workflows for assessment.

methodology.calculation: Metrics measured based on alignment with human-annotated gold standards.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating accurate data cleaning workflows.
methodology.validation: Performance validated against ground truth workflows.
